info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 3:21AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 13. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Vernon, Rapides, Beauregard and Allen Parishes. In Texas, Tyler, Hardin, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper and Southern Newton Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM Saturday to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
